messages.message:
<!channel> :bangbang:sorry for the channel call but please make sure to take some time to *`add your instabase.com (http://instabase.com) email to your github account`* (tutorial here (https://docs.github.com/en/account-and-profile/setting-up-and-managing-your-github-user-account/managing-email-preferences/adding-an-email-address-to-your-github-account)) *`before Monday 5/9`*, we are rolling out SSO SAML authentication on github instabase org (part of our SOC 2 compliance effort) If your github account doesn't have the instabase email associated with then *`you will lose access to instabase github repos`* once we set up OKTA SAML with Github on 5/9.

If you need any help please feel free to drop into <#C03CYT4KT6Z|> and we are happy to answer any questions on this matter
Can you also send out an email about this because messages often get lost in slack?
Please send atleast 2 emails as this is a breaking change.
yeah we will send a reminder next week as well
Do I need to set my IB email as my primary email, or just have it associated with the account?
@Krista Hardebeck great question! just associated with the account will be good. setting as primary is not required :pray:
Second question: Will this also impact the legal repos? I ask because we will need to notify sales / CS of this change if so
@Krista Hardebeck yes, I am drafting the email now, this will impact all github repos under instabase org

another question raised: we have a few users who don't have instabase.com (http://instabase.com) email but need to access some particular repo (e.g. legal), we can add them as external collaborators, in that case, to ensure they still have the same access.
